effect.name: Median
effect.description: Pick median pixel from certain rectangle defined by radius.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.radiusV
Vertical radius
parameter.comment:
Set median vertical radius.
If it is 0, value will be picked from Horizontal radius parameter.

parameter.name: av.percentile
Median percentile
parameter.comment:
Default value of 50 will pick always median values,
while 0 will pick minimum values, and 100 maximum values.
